summary: Gandalf is a powerful wizard and one of the main characters in J.R.R. Tolkien's books, *The Hobbit* and *The Lord of the Rings*. He is known as Gandalf the Grey and later Gandalf the White. He helps a group of dwarves and a hobbit named Bilbo on their adventures. His important mission is to stop the evil Sauron by destroying a magical ring. Gandalf is brave, wise, and a bit mysterious. He uses his powers and knowledge to guide and protect his friends. Many people love this character, and he has been played by famous actors in movies.
title: Gandalf
